summary: Equippment Restriction, Unequip Modified, now if you dont have the required skill, cant equip the item.
descriptionHtml:
Equippment Restriction, Unequip Modified, now if you dont have the required skill, cant equip the item.
configurable via MCM
for example if you have set Orcish armor to level 40.
and you have level 39 in Heavy Armor, you cant equip the item.
If you have one Handed level 41, you can equip Orcish one hand weapons.


STANDALONE!
author: ELAF
